description: World Builder gamification system - Personal island that grows with learning through quizzes
key_features: Quiz generation from slides (MCQ, fill-blank, voice)
World state with 3 zones (nature, civilization, arcane)
AI-generated world pieces as learning rewards

implementation_phases.name: Foundation
implementation_phases.description: World state, XP system, persistence, navigation structure

implementation_phases.name: Quiz System
implementation_phases.description: Quiz generation, UI for all question types, scoring, results

implementation_phases.name: World Pieces
implementation_phases.description: Zone mapping, piece prompt generation, image generation, unlock flow

implementation_phases.name: World Visualization
implementation_phases.description: Parallax diorama, zone layers, navigation, home stats

implementation_phases.name: Polish & Extras
implementation_phases.description: Voice quiz, pockets, quick mode, arcane reveal, celebrations
